p: Two independent reviewers (Baohui Fu and Yue Ji) evaluated the risk of bias, when they disagreed, a third author (Shouci Hu) was involved; the three reviewers discussed the article until all reviewers reached a unified conclusion. We evaluated the quality of the RCTs with the Cochrane Collaboration’s tool for assessing risk of bias for RCTs[ 11], and the cohort studies were evaluated with Newcastle−Ottawa scales[ 14].
